message.body: Did you get a snow day?
Nope, not even a delay! Apparently they only close when a storm is sensationalized, ugh
Waaaaaaaa
If I'm lucky they'll send me home early...not sure what those chances are looking like though haha
Looks pretty nasty there for the next few hours...
For once it would be better to be in Jersey
Yeah look on my fb page...and it's still coming down thick
That's how I knew...
I haven't told mom yet but it looks like Steven Valente is going to make me a suit for your wedding...
Oh snap! Custom made? How's she going to feel about that? :-)
Should be fine...the suits we looked at yesterday were 5 to 8 hundred. This will cost 7hundred tops, will fit perfectly and be exactly what I want (3 buttons for starters...)
The place we were at yesterday charges extra for the tailoring too...
Yep. I'm thinking a nice grey...darker than what the boys will be wearing
Oh, sounds perfect then!
Sounds good to me! Do you have a tie picked out or could that be a potential gift? Or are you planning on going tie-less?
Tie less?? Have you lost your mind? Never...and gift??? It's your wedding, you and Dan get the gifts...
Hahaha wellll etiquette says we should get our parents gifts too....
I got the second best gift of my life when you showed up...mom was number 1. Nothing else is necessary. End of discussion.
He's two too
It was a tie
Don't tell Evan he's 3...
Hahaha fair enough
It's actually realistic ...someone could say " the second best gift I ever got was my children"....
This is very true
Good- that's what I'll tell him ;-)
